title: Mailvox: A Sufficient Elevation
author: VD
content_html:
Vox must go into one of those radiation showers after posting on Gab. I honestly don’t know how he stands it.

All retardery looks pretty much the same from a sufficiently elevated height.

DISCUSS ON SG
